resources.name: Catalan EuroWordNet-lemon lexicon

organization.description: The Universitary Institute for Applied Linguistics (IULA) is a research and graduate training center at Universitat Pompeu Fabra that gets together various groups of researchers, research assistants, and scholarship students.
organization.title: IULA Universitat Pompeu Fabra
organization.name: iula-upf

name: catalan-eurowordnet-lemon-lexicon-3-0
notes: This is the Catalan EuroWordNet-Lemon lexicon. The lexicon was created from the Catalan Word-Net-LMF lexicon which is part of the Multilingual Central Repository (MCR http://adimen.si.ehu.es/web/MCR). The lexicon conforms to the 'lemon' specifications and it is linked to the Catalan Parole/Simple lemon lexicon (http://lod.iula.upf.edu/resources/metadata_SimpleParole-Catalanv2).
title: Catalan EuroWordNet-lemon lexicon (3.0)
